forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere shimmers with the last vestiges of sunlight, casting a soft glow on the buildings below while the edges of the city slip into a hazy embrace. The air holds a crispness, hinting at the cool temperatures as the forecast predicts a low near 56. However, a gentle breeze whispers from the west, rustling through the streets, reminding us of its presence with gusts that flirt with power. While the day may offer mostly sunny skies, the evening reveals a more complex tapestry—clouds drift in, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle after the witching hour, as if the city is contemplating a quiet sigh.

The marine layer, subtle and elusive, lays claim to the Golden Gate, painting the landscape in varying shades of gray and azure, but allowing the outline of the bridge to glimmer defiantly against the horizon. For those venturing out, a light jacket will serve well, a perfect companion for a stroll through the lively streets or perhaps a quiet sit at a local café, enjoying the understated beauty of the now-cloudy evening. Consider savoring a slow walk along the waterfront, inhaling the cool salt-kissed air, watching as the city transitions into a diaphanous evening, where the soon-to-be-missed sun leaves behind a promise of warmth when morning arrives again.
